title: Ticket #6341: Simplify + consolidate documentation for installing Condor
description: Our documentation for installing Condor is over-complicated and fragmented. We have some feedback from a user who has some suggestions. We should consolidate it to a single place, and make it much easier for users to get Condor installed + running as quickly as possible.
remarks:
2017-Jul-10 16:26:55 by coatsworth:
Hi all, I've made a first pass at a design doc for this:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1b1hb2VNiWYr0RkwOCuDFXF2Ut6RpEPzcTi79mzychVA/edit#

The main idea I'm going with here is to include "Simple Installation on Unix" and "Simple Installation on Windows" sections towards the top of the manual page. This should make it easy for new users to get started with a quick install.

Later sections of the manual page will get more detailed and serve as a reference.

Please have a look and let me know.
creator: coatsworth
